dct_title_s: Nieuwe kaart van t Eiland Ceilon
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,600,000 (E 78°30'00"--E 82°15'00"/N 10°30'00"--N 5°30'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Oriented with north to the left. Date from previous call number. On verso:"No. 88." In Dutch.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: Sri Lanka Maps Early Works to 1800
